column4: i'm trying to get my second monitor to work.. my main card is an onboard card using the intel driver, the second is a Matrox Millennium PCI.  when i boot my machine, my box freezes up right when GDM is about to start up, it completely freezes.
tried vesa drivers for you ATI card?
are you suggesting the onboard card is ATI?
either way, yes i've tried using vesa drivers for both the cards
I just read it wrong, thaught for a second that matrox = radeon.
Have you tried using just the matrox card?
yeah /k?ubuntu/ is the only distro that screws me over on that
it wont boot whenever the matrox card is plugged in
it ahs to be out of my box for my machine to boot

inserting the card into the PCI slot while the computer is running...
